short_description: coquille bonheur luxury is a travel agency based in beau bassin-rose hill, mauritius.
long_description: luxury at its best designing your personal journey from one-of- a-kind luxury accommodation, bespoke unique experiences with a blend of the mauritian culture. enjoy moments of peace and tranquility in the lounge before starting your next journey. coquille bonheur luxury is a provider of high quality services to guests that are looking for prestigious offers. all our transfers are made stress-free with professional licensed drivers, we offer exclusive transfers and tours designed by your desires. coquille bonheur offers a broader range of experiences, through private visits and excursions with personalisation and flexibility, using sensory stimuli to trigger deeper emotional responses. we demonstrate the capability to create innovative outings, combining traditional visits, scenery and relaxation. whether it's for business or pleasure, our services are designed so that everything is catered to our prestigious guests who are seeking for a preferred level of assistance and tailored to their personal requirements.

generated_description: coquille bonheur luxury is a full-service destination management company (dmc) based in mauritius, founded in 2006. the company specializes in luxury travel, offering a wide range of personalized services including accommodation, culinary journeys, private excursions, private yacht services, golfing, private helicopter rides, wedding and honeymoon planning, luxury shopping, and spa experiences. coquille bonheur luxury is known for its high-quality service, tailored itineraries, and exclusive access to unique rates and services. the company collaborates with 5-star inspected hotels and provides comprehensive ground services, ensuring a seamless and luxurious travel experience for its clients.
